page.title: 13BATTERNS WAY
page.content: I live in a street called Battens Way and there is a rumour that our street has been built on a Roman Graveyard. There is a Community Center where there is a disco on Thursday from 5pm to 7pm:a judo club, a cafe, a drinks bar, Jumble sales,and picture shows In my area vandalism is terrible. People spray paint on things. Such as subways and smash shop windows. People throw their rubbish anywhere they want to.Near the shops in Park Parade there is a lot of "popping"and "breaking" (that is a new form of dancing),they use flat cardboard boxes to lie on their backs and spin. There are a lot of glue sniffers,and often fights break out. There are lots of Football teams in Leigh Park. One is called Leigh Park United.It is for under Elevens.
